name: Demilich
description: The Demilich is a Tiny, eerie undead entity with an ethereal, skull-like appearance, often surrounded by swirling dust. It carries several soul gems on its skull, visible as tiny creature-shaped motes of light.
memorable: Its ability to devour souls and regain health makes it a terrifying foe, especially with its soul trapping mechanism that prevents resurrection.
goals: To manipulate and steal souls to sustain itself while evading destruction.
relations: Often associated with powerful undead or necromancer entities.
environment: Typically found in ancient ruins or places of significant magical energy.
strengths: High intelligence and dexterity allow it to evade attacks and execute complex strategies. It is immune to many damage types.
weaknesses: Vulnerable if confronted by foes capable of destroying its soul gems, which are crucial to its survival.
attacks: Devour Soul: targets creatures to inflict necrotic damage and regain health or instant death; can cause fear and blindness with its legendary actions.
most_powerful_ability: Devour Soul, which can turn foes into soulless corpses while simultaneously healing the Demilich.
senses: With truesight up to 60 feet, it can see through illusions and darkness, and it has a passive perception of 22.
skills: Exceptional at stealth and arcana, showcasing its magical prowess and ability to remain undetected.
additional_information: Immune to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage
Can take no damage on successful saving throws through Avoidance
Legendary Resistance allows it to succeed on failed saving throws
Does not require air, food, or sleep due to its undead nature
Can manipulate the battlefield with legendary actions like Dust Storm and Telekinesis
test_queries: tiny flying undead capable of manipulation
eerie magical creature with soul gems
high intelligence monster with fear effects
